title: Read all sources from a user-defined collection, paged.
description: How to read all sources in a user-defined collection.

response.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

    <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/sources/collections/CMMM-MMM/descriptions?start=2&count=1" rel="self" title="User-Defined Collection Source Descriptions"/>
